name: Everyone Hates Red Guy
description:
This is a submision for the Community Game Jam 2019, and my first game ever made! (Sorry for the bad English, I'm from Russia and I don't know it wery well)

Controls: WAD or arrow keys

A big thank to Blackthornprod (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g), Brakeys (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYbK_tjZ2OrIZFBvU6CCMiA)  and Dani (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIabPXjvT5BVTxRDPCBBOOQ) for their amazing tutorials, inspiration and  for making this jam.
